704875f-a.title: Brooklyn: Herkimer Street - Troy Avenue
704875f-a.text:
(1)
Herkimer Street, at the N.E. corner of Troy Ave., showing the Nana-
rene Cong. Church.  November 26, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, now known as Second Brooklyn 7th day Adventist Church.
June 7, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
